alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Haskell, Jones, northern Shackelford, Fisher and southern Throckmorton Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 610 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms from southeastern Throckmorton County, to southern Haskell County, to as far west as western Fisher County. This activity was moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Albany, Rotan, Roby, Lueders, Woodson, Sylvester, Hobbs, Mccaulley, Paint Creek, Avoca, Longworth, Fort Griffin, Neinda, Sagerton, Nugent and Lake Stamford Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
